commit.message:
a-direct.adb (C_Size): Returns an int64.

2014-08-01  Pascal Obry  <obry@adacore.com>

	* a-direct.adb (C_Size): Returns an int64.
	* osint.adb (System.CRTL): New with clause.
	(File_Length.Internal): Returns an int64.
	* s-os_lib.ads (File_Length): Returns an int64.

From-SVN: r213416
